name: Danzo
text:
Did you call for me, boss?
Ninja, Yahiko Danzo. I have arrived immediately in response to your summons.

name: Danzo
text:
...Like, like, like that, huh!?
What's suddenly gotten into you, Boss!?
Have you grown fond of me?

name: Danzo
text: It's true we talked about spinning tables at the Orient City club today, but I didn't expect to be called for anything other than a mission!

name: Danzo
text:
Could it be, given the timing, a Valentine's present sort of thing?
No, no—they're quite common this time of year!
Or rather......

name: Danzo
text: —Eh, is that really it?

name: Danzo
text: ...Ah, Boss, you're quite the type to be swayed by worldly trends, aren't you?

name: Danzo
text:
Wait, wait!!
I didn't say I didn't want it, did I!?
Of course I'll gratefully accept it, Thank you!

name: Danzo
text:
Boss, you have such a charming side!
I wish you'd share some of that cuteness with some of those stiff-necked folks.

name: Danzo
text:
And what's more—Whoa!
You really know my taste, don't you!
When did you research all this!?

name: Danzo
text:
...But still, you waited until the rave was over just for this?
The last train's gone, are you okay?

name: Danzo
text:
Alright!
This Danzo here will be your taxi!
As your attendant, I'll make sure to escort you home!

name: Danzo
text:
If you want to stay together longer,
stopping by my secret hideout is totally an option, you know?

name: Danzo
text:
Come on, hop on, hop on!
Of course, no charge, okay?
This is just a small token of my gratitude!
Danzo, with practiced ease, invited [Player] into his arms and lifted them up.

Danzo's warmth transferred to [Player]'s body.
Part of him was as always, having the coldness peculiar to metal—

name: Danzo
text:
—Hm, what?
You feel that the flesh-and-blood part is warmer than usual?

name: Danzo
text:
...You know.
That kind of perceptiveness
doesn't need to be shown off.

name: Danzo
text:
Of course 'I' am alive, too.
...My temperature can change with my emotions, you know.

name: Danzo
text:
Just be quiet and let me hold you!
Otherwise... I'll whisk you away to a place where no one will ever see you!
Danzo, who whispered in a low voice, pulled [Player] even tighter against his hard yet warm chest.

His gaze, which had been fixed on [Player], turned to the heavens.
Then he leaped high.
Next, using a nearby wall as a foothold, he leaped even higher.
Carried by Danzo, who ascended into the sky humming a tune, [Player] vanished beyond the skyscraper.
